page.title: 10LOCAL NEWS ITEMS MAY 1985
page.content: MIRACLE ESCAPE A lady of seventy had a near fall in her car at Hartland Point. Her car rolled backwards and stopped inches away from a 300 foot cliff. She owes her life to a small gorse bush which stopped her from falling. LIBERAL WIN North Devon Liberals won six of the seven seats in the county council elections. FIRE AT NORTH MOLTON Five houses were badly burnt at a fire in North Molton. Lots oftreasured clothes and valuable items were lost which could not be replaced. The people were moved to neighbours and others who were willing to help.
